21 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
22 {
23  // Initialize ROS.
24  ros::init(argc, argv, "arduino_setup");
25  std::string port;
26  ros::param::param<std::string>("~port", port, "/dev/ttyACM");
27  int baud;
28  ros::param::param<int>("~baud", baud, 57600);
29 
30  //Identifies the port via a system pipe
31  FILE *pipe = popen(("setserial -g "+port+"*").c_str(), "r");
32  std::string console = "";
33  char buffer[128];
34  while(!feof(pipe)) {
35  if(fgets(buffer, 128, pipe) != NULL)
36  console += buffer;
37  }
38 
39  pclose(pipe);
40 
41  //Separate ports into a vector of strings
42 
43  std::vector<std::string> port_list;
44  std::string buf;
45  for (std::string::iterator it = console.begin(); it != console.end(); ++it)
46  {
47  if (*it != '\n')
48  buf += *it;
49  else
50  {
51  size_t pos;
52  if ((pos = buf.find("UART")) != std::string::npos) //If found UART
53  {
54  port_list.push_back(buf.substr(0, pos-2));
55  }
56  buf.clear();
57  }
58  }
59 
60  //Run boost::asio io service in a background thread.
61  boost::asio::io_service io_service_vector[port_list.size()];
62  for (int i = 0; i < port_list.size(); ++i) {
63  new rosserial_server::SerialSession(io_service_vector[i], port_list[i], baud);
64  boost::thread(boost::bind(&boost::asio::io_service::run, &io_service_vector[i]));
65  }
